2009820.name: Svoboda 1945: Liberation Soundtrack
2009820.description:
Hear the music from award-winning historical adventures Attentat 1942 and Svoboda 1945: Liberation!

The official soundtrack by a renowned Czech experimental band DVA features both original compositions from the games as well as previously unheard variants of the tracks. Historical instruments meet moden-day ambient, captivating vocal performances mix with strings and electronic surfaces.

You'll get both MP3 and 24-bit WAV files.
